title: Antibody Tube Distribution
author: Opentrons
description: Transfers 24 antibodies to the first 24 wells in a 384 well plate.
process:
Transfer 40 ul from first tube to first well in 384 well plate.
Repeat for a total of 24 tubes, with a new tip for each antibody.
internal: TODO: merge with variable 384 plate filling.

markdown.description: Transfers 24 antibodies to the first 24 wells in a 384 well plate.
markdown.process:
1. Transfer 40 ul from first tube to first well in 384 well plate.
2. Repeat for a total of 24 tubes, with a new tip for each antibody.
